title: Bill Don't Lie - Chris Ryan and Andrew Sharp
description: Grantland's Chris Ryan and Andrew Sharp talk to Bill Simmons about the Thunder's playoff chances and the 76ers' tanking strategy, and wonder whether DeMarcus Cousins could get traded.
itunes:title: Bill Don't Lie - Chris Ryan and Andrew Sharp
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Grantland's Chris Ryan and Andrew Sharp talk to Bill Simmons about the Thunder's playoff chances and the 76ers' tanking strategy, and wonder whether DeMarcus Cousins could get traded.
